CustomField.description: Indicates this Ledger Entry is only used for balancing debits and credits. Accounting Subledger's jobs and calculations always ignore this Ledger Entry. This functionality is for Growth subscriptions only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates this Ledger Entry is only used for balancing debits and credits. Accounting Subledger's jobs and calculations always ignore this Ledger Entry. This functionality is for Growth subscriptions only.
CustomField.label: Secondary
